title: An Integral Existence
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four. Alright, we’re done!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Phew, good work, Kanan. Need a drink?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Thank you! *Gulp gulp*.... Haaah, that hits the spot~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thank you again for organizing a joint training between μ’s and Aqours today. I learned a lot from seeing Aqours’ training methods.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>No no, that’s my line! Knowing the performance that μ’s gives is built upon this type of basic training rekindled my spirit.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, I guess we both wanted to take good points from the other to make our own training even better, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah. After all, school idols might be rivals of each other, but we’re also friends who love the same thing, right? That’s why we all want to improve each other.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You’re right, we respect everyone in Aqours and Nijigaku. And to the same degree, we always think we need to give a performance that makes people around us see that we do.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, Aqours said the exact same thing the other day. I guess we’ve become an integral existence to each other before we knew it, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, it seems so♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
